channel.title: Keep crashing help please
channel.description: ok im always crashing when 20+ people get on is there some way for people to help me? (dont say get a better cpu and internet connection) cuz im at a lost here do ineed to ajust like to set it so more people can get on before it crashes or something i checked the 30+ people tut but it was removed i believe help me please!!! ok now in english: Hi, I was looking for some help if any one could spare a few minutes of their time to help me. My problem is that my server is crashing at twenty or more people, and I checked the "Let more than 30 people on your server" tut but I do believe it was removed. So please if any one can help me I would be ever so thankful. Thank you and have a nice day! :) (PS: Please dont be rude and say "get a faster cpu" or "get a better internet connection" or a combination of the two. and for those that must say that I have the best place u can put it and ill gladly tell you were u can put it! :)) NO FLAMMING OR SPAMMING PLEASE!!!

item.title: Keep crashing help please
item.dc:creator: @buzzman1992 buzzman1992
item.description:
@buzzman1992 wrote:

go into playerhandler.java and right at the top change max players to what you want and then go into server.java and at the bottom change max connections to what you want

Read full topic

item.title: Keep crashing help please

item.description:
@Wizzeled wrote:

oh hmmm ok then lol i wont tell u were to put it lol i figured it wasnt that cuz last person that told me did it in a very rude and mean way so i figure he was being a lamer flamer lol
so there is no other way to fix it? not even kinda stop it like fixing the max connections or somethin

Read full topic

item.title: Keep crashing help please
item.dc:creator: @Wizzeled Wizzeled
item.description:
@Wizzeled wrote:

ok im always crashing when 20+ people get on is there some way for people to help me? (dont say get a better cpu and internet connection) cuz im at a lost here do ineed to ajust like to set it so more people can get on before it crashes or something i checked the 30+ people tut but it was removed i believe help me please!!!
ok now in english:
Hi, I was looking for some help if any one could spare a few minutes of their time to help me. My problem is that my server is crashing at twenty or more people, and I checked the “Let more than 30 people on your server” tut but I do believe it was removed. So please if any one can help me I would be ever so thankful.
Thank you and have a nice day!
(PS: Please dont be rude and say “get a faster cpu” or “get a better internet connection” or a combination of the two. and for those that must say that I have the best place u can put it and ill gladly tell you were u can put it! :))
NO FLAMMING OR SPAMMING PLEASE!!!
